item.title: Greetings from Johannesburg, South Africa, where spring bursts with jacaranda blooms
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: FEMA promised funds to tsunami-proof an Oregon hospital. That money is MIA
item.description: The federal government promised an Oregon hospital millions of dollars to help prepare for an earthquake. They're still waiting for the money.

item.title: How an enduring debate over healthcare sparked a now record-long shutdown
